subject: Welcome David Saff as the new owner of the JUnit Yahoo! group
msgSnippet: Everyone: This is just to announce that I have passed the reins of this group to David Saff. David, as you know, is helping create the future of JUnit, while
messageBody:
Everyone:

This is just to announce that I have passed the reins of this group to
David Saff. David, as you know, is helping create the future of JUnit,
while I'm stuck on JUnit 3. I felt it appropriate that David own the
group, given his involvement in the JUnit project and given that every
day, JUnit grows in a direction I am no longer going.

This isn't goodbye, because I still read this group and respond somewhat
irregularly; but it is my chance to recognize one of the next
significant contributors in this arena. David, your moderators will do
most of the heavy lifting, so simply continue to answer questions and
improve JUnit.

Back to your regularly-scheduled threads.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
